inclusion.criterion: Resident physicians who have completed at least one month of cardiac rotation are included.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: This high fidelity simulation lab course if offerred to every resident that meets the criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: This is a part of their educational activity.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At the beginning of the course they are given the option to participate in the survey.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If they do not wish to participate in the survey it will not affect their education.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participitaion in the survey is purely voluntary.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Resident physicians that did not wish to participate in filling out the survey or not able to fill out the survey.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope with implantation of cardiac monitoring device.
